sentences.en: ...strangling and eviscerating rabbits for the pot.
sentences.cn: ...勒死并取出兔子的内脏以便下锅。

sentences.en: Garrote, Rupture, and Eviscerate are being increased in damage . More details to come.
sentences.cn: 绞喉, 割裂和剔骨伤害增加, 我们会逐步放出更详细的资料.

sentences.en: Save your cold blood eviscerate as a finisher.
sentences.cn: 留着你的冷血剔骨做为最后一击.

sentences.en: We agreed to eviscerate the proposed bill.
sentences.cn: 我们同意去除所提议案的本质部分。

trans.tran_cn: 取出内脏, 除去精华, 除去主要部分
trans.tran_en: to cut the organs out of a person’s or animal’s body
to cut the organs out of a person’s or animal’s body
